definition: The ninth month of the year, typically associated with the transition from summer to autumn. It is commonly referenced when discussing the changing seasons, annual events, and the progression of time.

examples.german: Der September ist der neunte Monat des Jahres.
examples.english: September is the ninth month of the year.

examples.german: Im September fängt die Schule wieder an.
Der September ist oft noch warm, aber die Nächte werden kühler.
examples.english: September is often still warm, but the nights get cooler.
